Anchor :  In a nationally televised statement on Monday , President Park Geun-hye put the blame of the Sewol ferry disaster on her own shoulders .
The president unveiled her plans to make a safer Korea and gave a tearful recognition to those who sacrificed their lives while saving ferry victims or searching for missing passengers .

Meanwhile , the presidential office says the president will appoint a new prime minister and carry out a Cabinet reshuffle after her current two - day trip to the UAE , where she will attend an event marking the installment of a nuclear reactor built by South Korea .
